definition: to be jealous of/fear/dread/scruple/to avoid or abstain from/to quit/to give up sth
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: Every year on the anniversary of the date she died, they would offer sacrifices to her grave.
sentences.chinese: 嗣後每年忌日兩人都到她的墳前祭祀。

sentences.english: I would never bare a bayonet on the anniversary of his death.
sentences.chinese: 在他逝世的忌日裏，我決不拔出刺刀。

sentences.english: Today also happens to be the anniversary of the death of my newborn daughter, whose grave I would normally visit.
sentences.chinese: 今天正好是我小女兒的忌日，通常我是要去上墳的。

definition: to offer sacrifices (to one's ancestors)/to hold or attend a memorial service
to worship/to observe religious rites/to pay one's respects (to one's ancestors etc)
Qingming or Pure Brightness Festival or Tomb Sweeping Day, celebration for the dead (in early April)
to die/to depart this life (euphemism)/same as 去世
Ghost Festival on 15th day of 7th lunar month when offerings are made to the deceased
the 7th day after a person's death/the first 7-day period after a person's death
